popularityCurve.label: i think if i could have picked one dream club to come to when i obviously parted way with the force it would have been toulon

clusterList.phrase: i think if i could have picked one dream club to come to when i obviously parted way with the force it would have been toulon

to move to europe has always been my dream arsenal is a fine club with fine young players and i cannot wait to break into the first team and the fellow arsenal players i have given my best here to boca juniors and they will always stick with me in my heart
this would be the first time leaving home as i have always been living with my parents but arsenal is the right choice for me
i have been following english football forever so to be here at last and to have a chance to play is just what i wanted
the truth is that right now i'm not thinking about going back returning to real madrid does not enter into my thoughts
real madrid is the place for me
manchester united is the club which has given me everything i want to stay here for a long time
